gen:link.label:label: BV592_2: The capital charge reported in SR.26.03 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Life underwriting risk [RFF/MP/RM should be equal to the loss in the value of assets minus liabilities (after the loss absorbing capacity of technical provisions) after the shock, with a minimum of zero. -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.26.03; Expression: If {SR.01.01, r0890,c0010}=Reported then {SR.26.03, r0600,c0060}=MAX(0,({SR.26.03, r0600,c0020}-{SR.26.03, r0600,c0030})-({SR.26.03, r0600,c0040}-{SR.26.03, r0600,c0050}))

BV592_2: The capital charge reported in SR.26.03 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Life underwriting risk [RFF/MP/RM should be equal to the loss in the value of assets minus liabilities (after the loss absorbing capacity of technical provisions) after the shock, with a minimum of zero. -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.26.03; Expression: If {SR.01.01, r0890,c0010}=Reported then {SR.26.03, r0600,c0060}=MAX(0,({SR.26.03, r0600,c0020}-{SR.26.03, r0600,c0030})-({SR.26.03, r0600,c0040}-{SR.26.03, r0600,c0050}))
